data.decision: Bracket B Winner: Direction D (Dark Premium) over Direction C (Bold Vibrant) for MSJ Swimmer Dashboard
data.rationale: Direction D scored 34/40 vs Direction C's 31/40. Deciding axis: "Trust beats excitement" - MSJ is a performance tracking tool where users need to trust their data. The elegant serif typography (Cormorant Garamond), gold accent highlights on achievements, and professional dark palette create a Garmin/Whoop-like experience that signals seriousness. Direction C's competition poster energy is valuable but overwhelming for daily use.
alternatives: Direction C (Bold/Vibrant): High-energy red accent, sharp corners, Space Grotesk bold - scored 31/40
Blend: Could use Direction C's energy for celebration moments within Direction D's framework
data.context: Tournament Bracket B for MSJ design system. Compared two brand-aura focused directions: bold_vibrant vs dark_premium. Project type: sports_tracker mobile app.
